TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBindingList implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type IBindingList = interface interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供繫結至資料來源時支援複雜和簡單案例所需的功能。

span.span: Provides the features required to support both complex and simple scenarios when binding to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此介面由實作類別。This interface is implemented by the class. 方法的實作應該會在該方法的實作相同的行為表現類別。Implementation of a method should exhibit the same behavior as the implementation of that method in the class. 當您呼叫或是方法，您應該會引發事件列舉型別。When you call the or methods, you should raise a event with the enumeration. 當您呼叫方法，您應該會引發事件列舉型別執行適當的索引。When you call the method, you should raise a event with the enumeration carrying the appropriate index. 加入的資料列處於的位置上，按 esc 鍵控制項可以移除新的資料列。The added row is in a state where pressing the ESC on a control can remove the new row. 引發事件列舉型別第二次在此資料列上表示的項目已不在 「 新 」 狀態中的資料列。Raising the event with the enumeration a second time on this row indicates that the item is now a row not in the "new" state. 當您移除的項目或呼叫新的資料列上的方法 (的資料列會實作)，應該引發事件列舉型別執行適當的索引。When you remove an item or call the method on a new row (if that row implements ), you should raise a event with the enumeration carrying the appropriate index. ## Examples 下列範例提供的簡單實作介面。The following example provides a simple implementation of the interface. `CustomerList`類別會儲存在清單中的客戶資訊。The `CustomerList` class stores customer information in a list. 這個範例假設您已使用`Customer`類別的範例中可找到類別。This example assumes that you have used the `Customer` class that can be found in the example in the class. [!code-cpp[Binding_Editable#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Binding_Editable/CPP/binding_editable.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Binding_Editable#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Binding_Editable/CS/binding_editable.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Binding_Editable#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Binding_Editable/VB/binding_editable.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object AddNew() cil managed

summary.span: 將新的項目加入至清單中。

span.span: Adds a new item to the list.
The item added to the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 才支援這個方法已`true`; 否則即為就會擲回。This method is supported only if is `true`; otherwise, a is thrown. 實作此方法表示清單必須了解要加入至清單的物件類型，以及必須了解如何建立該類型的新執行個體。Implementing this method means that the list must understand the type of objects to add to the list and must understand how to create a new instance of that type. 比方說，如果您有一堆`myCustomer`物件方法應該加入新`myCustomer`物件清單。For example, if you have a collection of `myCustomer` objects, the method should add a new `myCustomer` object to the list. > [!NOTE] > 如果這份清單中的物件實作介面，呼叫方法應該捨棄的物件，不將它新增至清單中，使用已建立物件時方法。If the objects in this list implement the interface, calling the method should discard an object, not add it to the list, when the object was created using the method. 物件只應新增至清單時呼叫方法。The object should only be added to the list when the method is called. 因此，您必須同步處理物件和清單仔細。Therefore, you must sychronize the object and the list carefully. 呼叫這個方法時，您應該引發事件列舉型別執行適當的索引。When this method is called, you should raise a event with the enumeration carrying the appropriate index. 加入的資料列是處於按下 esc 鍵，其中控制項可以移除新的資料列。The added row is in a state where hitting Esc on a control can remove the new row. 引發事件列舉型別第二次在此資料列上表示的項目現在是一般的資料列 （不在新的狀態）。Raising the event with the enumeration a second time on this row indicates that the item is now a normal row (not in new state).
